name: Final Message (Shaina, Rosie, Rutvik Katkoriya, Victoria Rafaelian, Lucas Ludics, Sam Luyen, Alex Basinski)
name_original: Final Message (Shaina, Rosie, Rutvik Katkoriya, Victoria Rafaelian, Lucas Ludics, Sam Luyen, Alex Basinski)
description:
WHO AM I?

Play as a Knight and Dog on their journey to the summit of Mount Arar, and experience the enjoyment of overcoming an insurmountable obstacle that eventually, after many failures, becomes possible to overcome.

THAT DOESN'T SOUND TOO CHALLENGING, WHAT'S THE CATCH?

You have five minutes to climb. No more, no less. Puzzles of various complexity await you on the dangerous slopes along with Three Keys that act as your ticket to the Summit, and there are many rival climbers on their own journeys you'll encounter, and if you're wise, learn from. 

WHAT IF TIME RUNS OUT?

At the end of those five minutes, all of your progress will be erased, save for the Keys you have found, and you will wake up once more at the base of the mountain.

SO WHAT'S THE POINT?

This is a game about hardship, overcoming the impossible, and experiencing a difficult, and memorable journey.

In life, there are many failures; and from those failures, the seeds of hope are born. With every dead end, and every death, you will come one step closer to solving the next puzzle, to taking one step further, to success, and to the end of your journey: 

The Summit.

Created by Forged Studio: https://forgedstudios170.wixsite.com/website
